data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Louzada, Rafael Batista, Wanderley, Maria das Gracas Lapa (2012): A new combination in Lapanthus (Bromeliaceae). PhytoKeys 17: 63-68, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.17.3642, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.17.3642
